Articles.Content:
Hey there! me again :3 I just wanted to let you guys know that I have made a new KSP short and I'd love your opinions!

The short is called laythe and all about the kerbals trying to land on it to see if it would be a good place for colonization after 5 years before when a space telescope took a picture of of one of jools moons that looked promising as a "backup kerbin" if you will This took me 4 days to film/edit and 5 hrs to render

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYkOCByvc8I

There are a few hiccups still because I'm still new to the world of cinematics but anyways, Hope you guys enjoy!

(Mods listed in the Desc of the Video)

- Andrew
